org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.top.window

Class RollingWindow.Bucket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.top.window.RollingWindow.Bucket
  • Enclosing class:
    RollingWindow

    private class RollingWindow.Bucket
extends Object
    Thread-safety is provided by synchronization when resetting the update time as well as atomic fields.

      (package private) boolean isStaleNow(long time)
      Check whether the last time that the bucket was updated is no longer covered by rolling window.

    • Method Detail

      • isStaleNow

        boolean isStaleNow(long time)
        Check whether the last time that the bucket was updated is no longer covered by rolling window.
        Parameters:
        time - the current time
        Returns:
        true if the bucket state is stale

      • safeReset

        void safeReset(long time)
        Safely reset the bucket state considering concurrent updates (inc) and resets.
        Parameters:
        time - the current time

      • inc

        void inc(long delta)
        Increment the bucket. It assumes that staleness check is already performed. We do not need to update the updateTime because as long as the updateTime belongs to the current view of the rolling window, the algorithm works fine.
